articles.title: 5 Gmail keyboard shortcuts you must try - Mint
articles.description: To boost efficiency in Gmail: Try these top 5 keyboard shortcuts.
articles.content:
Published By Govind Choudhary 
 | 17 May, 2023
To begin utilizing these shortcuts, you need to enable them first.
